coll-sort_alphabetically: Sɔŋmi li di ni piligiri shɛm
coll-notitle_title: Di bi tooi nya peeji maa yuli
coll-notitle_msg: Peeji maa yuli bi tooi buɣisi
coll-request_failed_msg: Muɣisigu kpɛna saha shɛli a mɔri ni a nya sɔŋsim a buku maa ni maa.
coll-save_collection_title: Bɔmi gubu ti a buku maa poi ka naan yi tari li
coll-save_collection_text: Piimi luɣ' shɛli a ni bɔri ni a buku maa be:
coll-save_category: Buku kam din nya gubu pahila yaɣa [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]].
coll-overwrite_text: Peeji din mali yuli [[:$1]]pun yi. A bɔrimi ni di zani a buku maa zaashee?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
A pun mali peeji shɛŋa a buku maa ni.
A bɔri ni a sabi gari a ni na mali buku shɛli maa, kpɛhimi neen' pala din yɛn be dini, bee ka a nyɛhi buku shɛli din na kpɛri maa?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
A buku maa bari yaɣi.
Peeji shɛŋa ku lahi tooi pahi.
coll-rendering_text:
Pahimi suɣulo zanimi biɛla gbana maa namya.

Progress: $1% $2

Peeji ŋɔ tuya ni di labiri neeri minti bihi sunsuuni saha kam. Di yi bi tooi niŋ, pahimi suɣulo ka dihi a vihigu soli din labiri neeri nɛma bia la.
coll-add_this_page: Zaŋmi peeji ŋɔ pahi a buku maa ni
